name: Play With NPCs (Sandbox)
description:
This is a sandbox game.

Currently in development. (Pre-game available right now) Planned full release: 2022.09.22

Made by Erwin.

How to play?

Numbers - Gun switch

Left-click - Shoot (Current weapon)

Right-click - Zoom

AWSD - Moving

Space - Jump 

Q - NPC spawn

R - Reset

Warning! It doesn't recommend those who struggle with epilepsy. This game contains flashing lights, fast moving and explosions. Thank you!
